description: This file contains a mock class 'VideoOutputPortConfigImplMock' derived from 'device::VideoOutputPortConfigImpl'. It uses Google Mock framework to create mock methods for 'getPortType' and 'getPort', intended for unit testing purposes related to video output port configuration.

classes.name: VideoOutputPortConfigImplMock
classes.description: Mock class for device::VideoOutputPortConfigImpl with mocked methods for testing.

methods.name: getPortType
methods.description: Mocked method returning a reference to device::VideoOutputPortType, representing the port type for a given ID.

methods.name: getPort
methods.description: Mocked method returning a reference to device::VideoOutputPort, representing a port retrieved by its name.
